CustomField.description: If populated, the product criterion will only be evaluated on the desired product added by the action specified here. If not populated, all occurances of the desired product will be evaluated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If populated, the product criterion will only be evaluated on the desired product added by the action specified here. If not populated, all occurances of the desired product will be evaluated.
CustomField.label: Product Criterion Target Rule Action
